title: CoverON Slim TPU Designed for Samsung Galaxy S22 Phone Case, Flexible Soft Cover - Black
features: Slim and Lightweight Case Designed by CoverON and compatible for the Samsung Galaxy S22.
Premium TPU Material: Flexible, rubber - like shock resistant TPU, Matted Finish.
Slim Fit Design: Weighs less than 1 oz. and is only a few millimeters thin for a minimalist, pocket-friendly approach.
Slightly-Tacky Grip: The TPU material makes it easier to hold than slick plastic cases with an improved rubber-like feel.
Extended Case Lips: A protective lip around the front screen and rear camera keep both lifted off surfaces, keeping both protected from scratches.
description: CoverON's Slim Fit TPU Phone Case Compitable for the Samsung Galaxy S22
Soft and flexible TPU rubber material
Extra slim contoured design hugs the phone tight, and weighs less than 1oz.
Minimalist design protects against average use drops and impacts in a pocket-friendly form factor
Front-facing protective lip keeps the phone screen lifted off flat surfaces
Designed for perfect compatibility on the Samsung Galaxy S22.
